mapper.update: update BOOKWRITER.T_REGISTER set REGISTER_DATETIME = #{registerDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REGISTER_FEE = #{registerFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PATIENT_NO = #{patientNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAFF_CODE = #{staffCode,jdbcType=CHAR} where REGISTER_NO = #{registerNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select REGISTER_NO, REGISTER_DATETIME, REGISTER_FEE, PATIENT_NO, DEPT_CODE, STAFF_CODE from BOOKWRITER.T_REGISTER
